short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the current extension to collect data for the future implementation of the detection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For starters, the extension has the role of collecting user data for the websites the user considers it to be a clickbait. 

In the next phase, the data will be collected and processed and on a future update of the extension, we will be using the result to predict the level of "clickbait" a website can be.
